website_summaries.verdict: The Fiskars 10 lb. Sledge Hammer's use of both demolition and driver faces definitely improves its versatility. We recommend this sledgehammer to both professionals and home users because of its manageable 10 pound head and ergonomic design.
pros: Features both a demolition face for breaking up concrete and a driving face tor installing spikes
Extra-large driving face improves strike accuracy
cons: Handle does not have eyelet for lanyard or wall attachment
Noticeably heavier than 8 pound sledgehammers sold for home use

customer_reviews.title: Different level hammer
customer_reviews.text: Reviewed: I had to reduce the stars as it broke in two after two years of intermittent use. I was splitting wood with a splitter when it broke. From the photo you can see the clean crystallized break. In my opinion the load area is too narrow for the forces encountered whilst hitting with this size hammer. First review: Nice to use. Breaks concrete slabs easily.
customer_reviews.author: Johan du Plooy

customer_reviews.title: THORS WAR HAMMER!
customer_reviews.text: This is a WAR HAMMER! THOR would be proud of this beast. It swings like a 10 lb monster, but it has such great shock absorption that you don't feel the impact as much as other sledges. Fiskars again designed a mighty tool here. The head of this beast is so very secure and forgiving that you could make a mistake and not destroy the tool. The companies life-time warranty keeps me a dedicated customer.
customer_reviews.author: Titan Art 6

customer_reviews.title: I love Fiskars!
customer_reviews.text: I love Fiskars products that includes this sledge hammer. Every Fiskars product I own or my family and friends own are well built and reasonably priced. Their customer service is even better! My cousin accidentally broke my Fiskars X27 Super Splitting Axe, I filled out a form on their website, attached a picture and within 24 hours I received an email stating that I would be receiving a replacement free of charge within 7 business days. Sure enough within 7 days a brand new axe was on my door step. :-D
customer_reviews.author: Ben R.

customer_reviews.title: This thing is a beast and works great!
customer_reviews.text: I have a standard 8lb sledge, but this being 10lbs does more damage and with the pointed edge delivers a more powerful impact. Made short work of some of my tasks, but does require a little more strength to swing.
customer_reviews.author: Eric P.

customer_reviews.title: If Thor wanted a longer hammer, he’d probably chose this one.
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing!! I’ve waited a while before buying a sledge hammer and this one is awesome. I use it almost exclusively for splitting wood and it works awesome. The wedges take the beating and when they get a little buried, I can twist the sledge hammer without breaking rhythm and hammer down with the rounded end. This usually does the trick and splits the log if it hadn’t already. Great design.
customer_reviews.author: Guillaume

customer_reviews.title: Fiskars 10lb sledge is the way to go..
customer_reviews.text: After looking all over and reading the prior reviews, I decided on a Fiskars. In terms of cost and dividend, this 10lb sledge sits in a class alone and it's built to last. Performance wise, the large striker head makes a great conductor and the ergonomic handle absorbs shock extremely well. To give others an idea of how well it works, please see the picture below. What started out as 10 tons of boulders is know a pile of manageable rubble.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Demo...
customer_reviews.text: This sledge certainly seems like it will handle whatever you throw at it. The oversized striking face is great and the wedge-shaped nose will help make short work of your demo! My sledge arrived with some nicks on the handle but nothing to require sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Quality and value / did the trick
customer_reviews.text: I picked this up to break down a couple of concrete slabs (both about 4' square and several hundred pounds each) that were too heavy for me to move whole, and I saved a few bucks over what it was priced at locally. The super effective-demolition edge was exactly what I needed and this sledgehammer made quick work of this task. The grip was comfortable and tactile, and I experienced no noticeable transfer of impact from the blows that I dealt with it. I have purchased a few other Fiskars products (loppers, pole saw, shovels, etc.) and have been pleased with their effectiveness, durability, and value. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: GSB

customer_reviews.title: Not what was ordered
customer_reviews.text: Well, this is not what is pictured, or described it is also a 12lb head not 10. The described hammer head had a wedge on one side and 10lb. Seeing as shiping was delayed (not sure why) I don't have time to return it as the project I needed it for has to be done by tomorrow. Now as for the hammer itself. It feels like my other fiskars quality wise. (Axe and spliting maul)
customer_reviews.author: roscoe

customer_reviews.title: WOW is all I have to say
customer_reviews.text: This 12 pound Fiskars sledgehammer is a pure beast. The orange rubber grip is awesome and better than others I've had. This sledgehammer can handle some serious abuse and punishment and comes back for more. The design and weight are a winning combo here. I was skeptical at first but not anymore. This gets the job done !
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Fiskars has become my “go to” for everything.
customer_reviews.text: Okay so at this point I’m pretty sure I have every axe made by fiskars. I have a wood stove and it’s a full time job splitting wood. I have a local tree service drop off wood on a regular basis and some times it’s gum and it a pain to split even with a splitting maul. So I’ve found that with the splitting maul a second person in combination with this hammer it’s not so bad. I’m used and abused all things made by them thus far and they’ve held up when most others failed miserably.
customer_reviews.author: ron harden

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty
customer_reviews.text: Great sledgehammer! If anything it worked a bit too well and had to do smaller swings to prevent the wedge from being lost in the stump. Used this in combination with a one handed small sledgehammer to break an old tree trunk up. Worked like a charm and am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Hakunamatata49

customer_reviews.title: This will be the last sledge you will need.
customer_reviews.text: This thing really works. Used it to break up a concrete patio. Had been using a regular sledge initially, it was hard and slow. Once tbis arrived I started back in on the patio. Cut the work in half. This sledge means business. It's not for precision demo but if you want to just destroy things this is the tool for it.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: This hammer will do some damage
customer_reviews.text: This hammer is is great it will do the damage that you need and more and the shock absorbing handle is a life saver when your doing big jobs.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Woodard

customer_reviews.title: Best sledge ever
customer_reviews.text: Tough , easy to swing best sledge I have ever used by far
customer_reviews.author: Tom Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: It is tough. Not my favorite sledge but works well. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: Maamborn

customer_reviews.title: This thing screams quality.
customer_reviews.text: I never thought I would be excited about a sledgehammer, but this one change is all that. I mean really, this is one amazing sledgehammer. There is absolutely no vibration that bangs your hands when you use it because of the Innovative handle, and that makes it worth the extra cost to me.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Smith

customer_reviews.title: great too but wear your gloves.
customer_reviews.text: Overall a nice solid tool. The grip does tend to blister your hands so inwould recommend wearing gloves. Great buy for a good tool!
customer_reviews.author: DriveByWire222

customer_reviews.title: Nice 10 lb'r
customer_reviews.text: Works fine. I have used it on a wedge to break up some wood. I have some old cement stairs that it worked nice on. The wedged face is nice. Not allot of vibration in the handle. I'll use this for years.. Especially with that warranty
customer_reviews.author: Manuel Seguin

customer_reviews.title: Love Fiskars!
customer_reviews.text: This has been awesome! I'm a huge fan of Fiskars. They make great tools and this really did its job with breaking up concrete without hurting the hands from impact. I have this and the x27 chopping ax and little 14 inch hatchet.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsey

customer_reviews.title: It achieves its intended purpose.
customer_reviews.text: Its a sledge hammer. It's big, It's heavy, and it hammers things real good. Not sure what else to say. I used it to remove the gas-lift on my DX Racer chair, since years of sitting drove it too deep into the wheel platform. Its also a good conversational piece at dinner parties!
customer_reviews.author: bwizz

customer_reviews.title: It's OK.
customer_reviews.text: Too much plastic on the handle for my liking. I do like the head of the hammer.
customer_reviews.author: Steven S.

customer_reviews.title: This is a well balanced sledge hammer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to break up some concrete block under an old porch. It's been working great.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Fair price! Great tool for breaking things or just getting work done. When you need a BFH look no further.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Dewees

customer_reviews.title: Worth the extra money because of the vibration reduction
customer_reviews.text: Great but not very ergonomic. Pretty straight just a handle but its very good low shock/vibration. The dual head is a big deal!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Very good sledge
customer_reviews.text: I got this at a great price and the side that is wedged has been excellent at busting some big rocks.
customer_reviews.author: jim

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: my original was improperly packaged and the box arrived via UPS with a hole in the box with no contents the reported it and i returned the empty box with no issue, my replacement arrived 2 days after i had reported the incident and it was worth the wait, this thing is awesome
customer_reviews.author: Brian Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Great sledge
customer_reviews.text: Another winner from fiskar; is heavy, as you’d want it to be, but well balanced and comfortable to swing.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: it does the job with so much less impact on my old body
customer_reviews.author: billlamson

customer_reviews.title: sturdy hammer
customer_reviews.text: used it to demo a concrete diving board. took it out in minutes
customer_reviews.author: JWW

customer_reviews.title: Fiskars Sledgehammer with ax head
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, shipped quickly and secure. nice grip on the handle. Seems very sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Eve M

customer_reviews.title: Well made & strong
customer_reviews.text: Works very well at Busting concrete comfortable to use well
customer_reviews.author: Ray hahn

customer_reviews.title: More satisfying than a jackhammer
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a beast, very comfortable and smashes thick concrete with ease. It's pretty fun to use too.
customer_reviews.author: Scott E. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Must have with the wood maul
customer_reviews.text: Best hammer ever used.... bought with the wood maul.... flawless performance and the bigger head really helps when you are swingin tired...
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Graham

customer_reviews.title: Hammer of Thor
customer_reviews.text: Damn this thing works great. Hammered some old concrete and some old small stumps. Heavy but it sure works! The flat edge works great for concrete, and the angled end works good for destroying things, including concrete and wood.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: This thing is a beast
customer_reviews.text: One of the best purchases made! It feels like you could destroy anything with it!
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: this was a trial and I LOVE the thing
customer_reviews.text: I have plenty of Fiskars axes, this was a trial and I LOVE the thing, probably should not have gone with the 10LB, picked up another sledge on the site and only swung it once my hands hurt so bad for 5 min I never touched it again, I only used my new Fiskars anymore
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sledge
customer_reviews.text: A little expensive but I would much rather pay more for a product that I know will last a very long time. This thing can take a beating and give a beating!
customer_reviews.author: Kaylea Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Hulk smash!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much the greatest sledgehammer ever made! Made short work of this block and the more stubborn pieces were easily pulverized when struck with the wedged surface. The isocore handle eliminates shock and feels good in your hand. I would highly recommend the fiskars line of tools from the shovel to the axe I have been very impressed!
customer_reviews.author: BuckSnort

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: The destruction end busts up rocks like no ones business! And it doesnt take too much damage so it will last quite a while!
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Just like the other reviews said
customer_reviews.text: Just like the other reviews said. Its a beast! I'm using it to break up 5 inch concrete, much better than the hammer I paid 30$ for at a department store.
customer_reviews.author: ccorbin

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal.
customer_reviews.text: If you wanna feel like a modern day Thor, buy this. It’s awesome and looks badass. Oh and it works really freakin good too. No trouble busting up some 8” thick concrete without any hand shock.
customer_reviews.author: Erin S.

customer_reviews.title: Handle split on the first use!
customer_reviews.text: First time I used it, the handle split trying to bust up a rock, very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Effective
customer_reviews.text: Works really well and fit nicely behind my toolbox at work for on the go jobs. Love this
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to help split some very tough, knobby pieces of wood. This thing is a beast.
customer_reviews.author: CBZ

customer_reviews.title: Not new
customer_reviews.text: Product came scratch up like it had been used very dissatisfied
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Very well designed hammer. Big striking face reduces misses. Works great with the Large face Fiskers Maul. Combination will split wood no matter what kind, size or hardness.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie Durham

customer_reviews.title: Packs a punch.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great hammer. I did eventually break the handle on it but I got it replaced and next day shipping. Did have to send in the broken one though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing - who knew?
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product- wish I had ordered a LONG time ago!
customer_reviews.author: B. L. Friberg

customer_reviews.title: It is awesome.
customer_reviews.text: Wow. I look for ANY reason to use this. It is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Great sledge hammer!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well built sledge hammer. Love Fiskars products.
customer_reviews.author: Matt S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice sledge.
customer_reviews.text: Great sludge and cheaper than running to a box store. Should last for decades.
customer_reviews.author: BML

customer_reviews.title: works good
customer_reviews.text: good weight and it has the angled side too. works great for beating on demo cars, the handle doesnt jar your arms even when you over swing. holding up good so far too so id reccomend it
customer_reviews.author: will

customer_reviews.title: Just Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome tool. Extremely destructive and useful when you just need a heavy hammering to drive product into the ground with little recoil.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Now this is a great improvement over the old stuff...it's dense and dead, and powerful with a single stroke . Minimal vibration.
customer_reviews.author: MARK A. DESALVO

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: Great feel, works well, excellent to have the back head option
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The big head is nice. If only somehow they could make a 100 ...
customer_reviews.text: The big head is nice. If only somehow they could make a 100 pound hammer that felt like a 2 pound hammer. Until they can, this is probably one of your best options.
customer_reviews.author: Mountain Man

customer_reviews.title: Best of kind.
customer_reviews.text: Just a cut above. I have had a dozen sledge hammers and this is the best for grip and strength.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Beetle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice sledge should of got the 8 pound 10 pound little heavy for this old man.
customer_reviews.author: JGE

customer_reviews.title: great product!
customer_reviews.text: This sledge hammer is a beast. I didn't realize how heavy 10 lbs would be after a few swings. In all, great product!
customer_reviews.author: VV Minooka

customer_reviews.title: It is a solid 10 lb Sledge Hammer. The ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a solid 10 lb Sledge Hammer. The chiseled side will destroy anything. Large hammering surface. Yes, there are cheaper ones out there, but this one will last forever.
customer_reviews.author: sh.sac

customer_reviews.title: Fiskars makes great stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Fiskars makes great products. I used this for splitting wood and it is perfect. You never have to worry about the head of this hammer getting lose!
customer_reviews.author: John Camp

customer_reviews.title: Fuskars quality
customer_reviews.text: Typical Fiskars quality. It just works well and is durable.
customer_reviews.author: Duncan M

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: demolition face works amazingly well -- shattering concrete sidewalk and cinderblock wall in a few blows
customer_reviews.author: jammage

customer_reviews.title: The 10 pound is pretty heavy to swing
customer_reviews.text: Very strong and durable, used this to knock down a cement and stone fireplace. The 10 pound is pretty heavy to swing, just so that you are aware. I am a 52 year old woman who thought that I was going to do the job myself, but ended up having someone younger and stronger do it because the hammer was a little too heavy for me.
customer_reviews.author: Roo

customer_reviews.title: Unbalanced
customer_reviews.text: Expensive fancy head design is not balanced so swinging takes extra effort to control. Pointed head end does seem to apply more breaking force. Oversized flat head no advantage in breaking, just in driving stakes.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: but it's really just because it's a really cool hammer. I've hit some things with it
customer_reviews.text: I have this by my desk at work for "doing forearm exercises", but it's really just because it's a really cool hammer. I've hit some things with it, and it does hammer stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Keith McAfee

customer_reviews.title: THIS PRODUCT IS NOT MADE IN FINLAND !!
customer_reviews.text: I am totally disgusted! I exhaustively searched on the product page to try to find out where this was made, they again and again present it to you as if this is a product that is made in Finland. It absolutely is not! The product is decent, but way overpriced for a product that is made in Taiwan and Vietnam. I am very disappointed in Fiskars and Amazon for allowing this kind of deceptive advertising to the consumer.
customer_reviews.author: scoremat

product_meta.title: Fiskars PRO 750620-1001 IsoCore 10 lb Sledge Hammer, 36 Inch,Orange/Black
product_meta.description: Size:10 LBThis rugged, powerful sledge hammer allows you to take on intense demolition tasks while helping to reduce muscle fatigue and joint pain. Premium steel is forged into a unique head featuring a wedged demolition face to maximize destructive force and an extra-large driving face for improved strike accuracy. Fiskars patented, industry-leading IsoCore Shock Control System absorbs strike shock and vibration, reducing the punishment your body takes, and a dual-layer handle captures any lingering vibration. An inseparable riveted head will not slide down or snap off, even when swinging with maximum force. A performance handle design fits your hand securely and comfortably, and strategic texturing helps improve grip while reducing blisters. This design has been tested to exceed U. S. standards for striking tool durability to withstand the toughest work environments.
feature_bullets: Ideal for demolition work like shattering concrete (demolition face) or driving stakes and wedges (driving face)
Wedged demolition face concentrates force for up to 5X more destructive power than traditional designs and directs debris to the sides, not back at you
Extra-large diameter driving face improves strike accuracy
Patented IsoCore Shock Control System absorbs strike shock and vibration to reduce the punishment your body takes, transferring 2X less shock and vibration than wood handles

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars252 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
